item.title: Windows 11 Pro, Intel i7, 2TB SSD, 64GB RAM: HP Slashes $2600 From Its 5/5 Rated Laptop
item.content:encoded:
September is the best month to score amazing laptop deals, thanks to the back-to-school season. Unlike Prime Day in July, which barely had any laptop discounts, Amazon is really stepping up this time: They’re offering a huge $2,600 off this HP business laptop (Intel 13th Gen i7-1355U, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, FHD Touch Screen, 64 GB DDR4, 2 TB SSD) that’s getting perfect 5-star reviews. It’s now available for $1,099 down from $3,699. Plus, you also get some handy extras included like a wireless mouse, a USB-C hub, and a 128GB flash drive.

See at Amazon

Supercharged HP Laptop

This HP laptop comes with the latest Intel 13th Gen i7-1355U processor (reaching up to 5.0GHz) and with 10 cores and 12 threads. That simply means it can keep pace with everything you do. It’s paired with Intel Iris Xe Graphics so the visuals are sharp and silky.

With 64GB of DDR4 RAM and a spacious 2TB SSD, you’ll never be held back by this laptop no matter how many programs you have running or how much data you’re storing.

What’s more, the laptop is only 3.5 pounds and 0.73 inches thick so it won’t smother your bag or take up too much space. The 15.6-inch touchscreen screen is also very comfortable and bright with full HD resolution (1920 by 1080 pixels) and 300 nits of brightness: everything will stand out and look alive.

When it comes to staying in touch, this laptop has it all covered: It has Wi-Fi 6, which keeps the internet fast and consistent, and Bluetooth 5.3 for rapid pairing with your wireless devices. The camera is excellent for work meetings or online lessons, thanks to HP’s True Vision HD Camera that features a Privacy Guard for keeping things safe. The audio system is optimized for crisp and well-balanced sound so calls and video are clear without the use of headphones.

One of the standout features is the new Copilot key that launches Microsoft’s AI assistant. You can get help summarizing reports, pulling out insights or automating tedious tasks – all at the touch of a button. Based on Windows 11 Pro, this laptop comes with enhanced security features and tools that business users will appreciate.

Do not delay—September’s the time when it is worth grabbing it before it goes up in price again.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/windows-11-pro-intel-i7-2tb-ssd-64gb-ram-hp-slashes-2600-from-its-5-5-rated-laptop-2000624604

item.title: Amazon Slashes Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Following iPhone 17 Launch, 256GB for the Price of 128GB at Record Low
item.content:encoded:
Samsung and Amazon are running a heck of a promotion on the Galaxy S25 FE. The FE line of Galaxy phones are Samsung’s much more affordable entry point into it’s ecosystem of products. It’s great for someone looking for a phone upgrade, but who doesn’t want to spent thousands on a single device. And right now, it’s become even less expensive thanks to this Amazon limited time deal. The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is discounted down from $810 to just $650. The 20% savings equates to $160. Not only that. This deal includes and Amazon gift card for $100 and you can upgrade from the base storage to double capacity for no extra charge.

Gift cards are the best bonus you can receive in bundles like this. And this isn’t just like a Samsung gift card that needs to be spent on more Galaxy products. It’s Amazon. So you can put that toward basically anything you can imagine. Buy yourself some new flannels for Fall. Buy $100 worth of ladybug eggs. Truly, you can get anything.

See at Amazon

Big, Bright, and Smooth

The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE has a wide 6.7-inch display with a refresh rate of up to 120Hz. It’s super lightweight and is built with a slim profile. Far less risk for folks who like to lay and bed, scrolling late into the night, who might on occasion drop their phone on their face.

The Galaxy smartphone is equipped with a 12MP selfie camera on the front capable of taking sharp photos and vivid videos. On the revers size, you’ll find three additional cameras — the 12MP ultra wide camera, the 8MP telephoto camera, and the 50MP main camera.

You can even make minor edits to your photos, resizing or erasing distracting elements in the shot. Night photography became a lot easier as you can now reduce grain and boost detail even in low light conditions. And you videos can algorithmically detect unwanted background noise from the the footage, isolating only the details you want to be heard.

Battery life is pretty solid. It’s working with a powerful 4,900mAh battery and supports Samsung’s Super Fast Charging 2.0 to bring it back up from zero to 100% quickly.

Choose between four stylish color options. You can pick either jet black, icy blue, navy, or white. All four choices are part of the limited time deal. Upgrade any of them from 128GB to 256GB for no charge, save $160, plus get a free $100 Amazon gift card with your purchase.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/amazon-quietly-drops-samsung-galaxy-s25-fe-to-its-lowest-price-yet-following-iphone-17-debut-2000624466
